question: Are Veggie burgers made entirely from soy protein and vegetable sources halal. This is the product:http://www.yvesveggie.com/products_details.php?product_id=41
answer:
QUESTION
Assalamu-Alaikum, Are Veggie burgers made entirely from soy protein and vegetable sources halal. Companies manufacturing these say this is simulated beef but it does not contain any meat or its derivatives. Specifically I am talking of this product: http://www.yvesveggie.com/products_details.php?product_id=41 JazakAllah.
ANSWER


Share:
If the burgers are manufactured entirely from veggies, it will be Halaal.
However, if there are other ingredients / spices mixed into the patty, it
will be essential to look into those ingredients as well.

You may request the manufacturers to forward to you a list of the
ingredients. You may also seek the advice of eat-halal.com

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
